mapper.select: SELECT bb.fund_code AS fund_code, --基金代码 bb.fund_name AS fund_name, --基金名称 bb.record_date AS record_date, --权益登记日 bb.out_dev_date AS out_dev_date, --场外红利发放日 bb.def_share_mode AS def_share_mode, --分红方式:1现金分红 2红利再投资 3特殊分红 bb.unit_ataxdev AS unit_ataxdev, --单位税后红利 (元/份) bb.nums AS nums FROM (SELECT aa.*, ROWNUM AS rn FROM (SELECT tfb.*, COUNT(1) OVER(PARTITION BY tfb.fund_code) AS nums FROM t_fund_bonus tfb WHERE tfb.fund_code = #{fund_code} ORDER BY tfb.record_date) aa WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end_number}) bb WHERE bb.rn >= #{start_number}
